Sources
=======

The sources are available at the following links:
Sources

- https://medium.com/analytics-vidhya/measure-driving-distance-time-and-plot-routes-between-two-geographical-locations-using-python-39995dfea7e
- https://public-content.vinci-autoroutes.com/PDF/Tarifs-peage-asf-vf/ASF-C1-TARIFS-WEB-2021-maille-vf.pdf .

- https://www.data.gouv.fr/en/datasets/gares-de-peage-du-reseau-routier-national-concede/
